title: What are your top 10 side-tracks in Kpop? - Quora

response.answer_text: EDIT: I just got into some more music and decided to add some songs as honorable mentions (basically some more songs since they said top-10) This is an update adding on to it. No order as well. Seventeen - Good to MeA.C.E. - Black and BlueONEUS - Intro: TimeJUS2 - LONG BLACKTaemin - ThirstyCLC - I NEED UVillain - Luhvin ItTVXQ! - Sooner Than LaterLay - Amusement ParkTWICE - TURN IT UPHmmm… this is sorta hard, but I'll try. In no order whatsoever. From the artists ATEEZ, SKZ, BTS, EXO, SF9, NCT, KEY, and 1TEAM. (+ CLC, A.C.E., SVT, JUS2, ONEUS, TAEMIN, Villain, TVXQ!, 1.) ATEEZ - Desire. (TREASURE EP. 2 Zero to One < album). I was gonna say HALA HALA but this one is just sjsjsjk. It makes me wonder how someone managed to make a song this good. The beat and melody is everything (me exaggerating,, but stILL). The title track for this album is Say My Name, just gonna add this here. 2.) 1TEAM - Countdown. 1TEAM (원팀) - Countdown (Color Coded Han|Rom|Eng Lyrics/가사) (Hello!—EP < album). This group just debuted last month, and I have to say, their debut was solid. Nevermind,, not solid, the debut was a fucking brick wall; it was perfect. They only have 3 songs and the title track is Vibe. The song changes between two fast and slow paces. And the beat drop was amazing. I recommend. 3/4.) Stray Kids - Chronosaurus/Maze of Memories. (Clé 1 : MIROH < album) I'm sorry, I couldn't choose. The first one, Chronosaurus lowkey reminds me of ‘Natural’ by Imagine Dragons for some reason. And Maze of Memories is like a rap battle of something like that. All the members—yes, even the vocalists—take turns rapping one at a time; in Korean, then in English at the end. MIROH is the title track. gold album. 5.) SF9 - Fall In Love. (NARCISSUS < album) I don't really stan SF9 but I'm getting to it. This song reminds me of SEVENTEEN's Adore U but not really. It has a sad tinge to it. It sounds really sad. I haven't looked at the lyrics yet, so I'll probably get to it. Also, the tile track is Enough. 6/7.) KEY - Good Good/Chemicals. (FACE - The 1st Album < album) I had a hard time with this one. He has an album I would call a gold album, which means (I feel) there are no bad songs. He has this type of EDM style, I would say. He really likes to experiment with his sound and has sometimes unusual sounds as his background that sound really good. 10/10 my dudes. Good Good makes me wanna scream; the electric guitar (?) in the background during the key part (hehe, get it,, KEY—man I'm funny) is satisfying. Chemicals has a good beat drop. Title track is One Of Those Nights ft. Crush. 8.) NCT 127 - Angel. NCT 127 - Angel [Audio] (LIMITLESS - 2nd Mini Album - EP < album) I was ‘bouta pick Whiplash (hem hem ;)) I know what you're thinking, and you're right,, go ahead—look at them lyrics,, I dare you.) but this song popped up in my head immediately so I had to add it on here. It is very calming, and the guitar in the background melding with Haechan's voice is soothing. The title track is LIMITLESS, which is one of my favorite songs. So good. 9.) BTS - Tomorrow. (School Luv Affair < album) I remember being a new ARMY and playing SuperStar BTS to help me with memorizing songs and have fun at the same time. When I first heard Tomorrow, I felt euphoria. I still do to this day. Outro: Tear was a close second but on decided on this song. Namjoon's rap,, that's all you need to know. Title track is Boy in Luv. 10.) EXO - EL DORADO. (The Second Album ‘EXODUS' < album) I really love this song—it makes me wanna cry sometimes. Especially during Baekhyun's high notes. The instrumentals are great, too. It sound almost too good. Been through was about to take over but I decided on this one. Title track is Call Me Baby. My dudes, it took me an hour to write this and I didn't even realize. So sorry. I hope you guys try to listen to some of these recommendations. Thanks!

OOOOOO I LOVEEE THIS QUESTION!!!! okay so In no particular order imma just name the side tracks I absolutely love *all credit to owners of the videos* Love Myself: Answer (BTS) When I first heard this song on the album I instantly fell in love with the vocals. When jungkook says “I’m learning how to love myself” it really hits me BTS (방탄소년단) - Answer: Love Myself (Color Coded Lyrics Eng/Rom/Han/가사) Hot (TWICE) FANCY YOU IS A…. wait for it… MASTERPIECE.. I love all the songs, but this one in particular is just amazing… momo really shines in this song for me… it gives me like a summer vibe that’s very refreshing to listen to TWICE - HOT (트와이스 - HOT) [Color Coded Lyrics/Han/Rom/Eng/가사] Kick it (BLACKPINK) In my opinion BP could’ve pulled this off as the title track… it has so much potential… when ever I hear it in the car I’m just screaming “CAN I KICK IT YEAH!” and people prolly think I’m insane lmao BLACKPINK - Kick It (Color Coded Lyrics Eng/Rom/Han/가사) ALL SIDE TRACKS IN THE WAR & DMUMT (EXO) People are going to come at me for this… but honestly both of these albums songs are insanely good… it’s so hard to pick a fav from these albums for me… there’s so much variety with these two albums (What you do gives you like a 70s vibe while Oh la la la gives you like straight up RnB)…so I suggest listening to ALL side tracks… “YO NICE SKIRT” haha chanyeol part in forever is iconic lmao.. [Full Album] EXO - DON’T MESS UP MY TEMPO – The 5th Album [Full Album] EXO - THE WAR - The 4th Album (Korean ver.) What 2 Do (DEAN) I LOVE LOVE LOVE LOVE this song… honestly 130 mood: TBRL is just an amazing album… for Dean I really suggest reading the lyrics bc they are so impactful… if you want rnb listen to him… I love this song the most tho What 2 Do - DΞΔN (ft. Crush, Jeff Bernat) Audio Voices (STRAY KIDS) This is the best stray kids song don’t at me.. I’ll be honest if this had come out as a comeback this year since they have more recognition… it would be huge.. Han singing high notes and rapping i mean like he flexes on all of us… I think this song is SOOOO underrated… and the lyrics are so meaningful I cry Stray Kids "Voices" Performance Video Back 2 U & Good thing (NCT127) tbh limitless was NCT127 best album in my opinion… all of the side tracks are amazing on this album … these two are tied bc they stick out the most to me.. good thing when you listen to it makes you feel so happy ab yourself hahah.. and back 2 u is just really catchy for me… imma just put the whole album as the link [Full Album] NCT 127 - NCT #127 Limitless [2nd Mini Album] I am me (Got7) This song makes me feel so good ab myself… it really motivates me and I supports me when I feel down… idk it’s just a very empowering song to me… please listen to this one GOT7 (갓세븐) - 'I AM ME' Lyrics [Color Coded_Han_Rom_Eng] Where R U (Mamamoo) Damn… that’s really all I have to say… they honestly never disappoint me in their side tracks… I love this song sooooo much… and gogobebe was iconic MAMAMOO (마마무) - 'Where R U' (Color Coded Lyrics | Han | Rom | Eng) by kim clapz Good to me (Seventeen) THIS SONG OMG IS AMAZING… this is another one I will shout in the car… I love love love this song sm.. “CUZ YOU YOU MY EVERYTHING” SEVENTEEN (세븐틴) - GOOD TO ME (Color Coded Lyrics Eng/Rom/Han/가사) So yeah those are some… there’s so more tho… I’m a huge fan of side tracks hahah and I feel sometimes ppl don’t listen to them, they just listen to the title songs… the side tracks are what make the album GOLD.. hahah just sayin
